movie_title: This Black Hole Could be Bigger Than The Universe
introduction: Get your ✨Curiosity Guide✨ now on the kurzgesagt shop here: https://shop.kgs.link/Curiosity and unlo

vocabulary.definition: a particular way of viewing things that depends on one's experience and understanding
vocabulary.example: Traveling to different countries helped me gain a new perspective on life.

vocabulary.definition: closely compacted in substance; having parts close together
vocabulary.example: The fog was so dense that I could barely see ahead of me.

vocabulary.definition: a point in space-time where gravitational forces cause matter to be infinitely dense
vocabulary.example: Scientists are still trying to understand what happens inside a black hole's singularity.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the universe or outer space, especially as distinct from Earth
vocabulary.example: The astronauts were in awe of the cosmic beauty they witnessed from the space station.

vocabulary.definition: based on conjecture rather than knowledge; uncertain
vocabulary.example: The investment in cryptocurrency is speculative and carries a high level of risk.

vocabulary.definition: make the best or most effective use of (a situation, opportunity, or resource)
vocabulary.example: The company aimed to optimize its production process to increase efficiency.
